story.storykicker: Actor Jay Bhanushali, who last participated in Khatron Ke Khiladi 7 with wife Mahhi Vij, will reportedly host The Voice India Kids.
story.storybody:
Actor Jay Bhanushali, who has showcased his anchoring skills in shows like Dance India Dance and Dil Se Naachein Indiawaale, is said to have been approached to host the upcoming children singing reality show The Voice India Kids.

After the success of The Voice India--the Indian edition of the internationally acclaimed reality format The Voice--the makers are coming  up with The Voice India Kids, which will offer youngsters between the age group of 6 to 14 a chance to showcase their singing talent on a national platform.

"The makers of the show have approached Jay to host the first season of The Voice India Kids. Jay, who is known for his outstanding hosting skills and connects well with the audience, fits best for the role. The makers and the artistes are in the last stage of discussion," said a source close to the show.

The Voice India Kids will go on air in July on &TV.

Also read: After the exit of husband Jay Bhanushali, is Mahhi Vij being targeted on KKK7?

Singer Neeti Mohan will be seen as one of the coaches in the new season.
